content: 3 great lots up for auction from Cypher Hodl Stamps/Postage/Bills/Bonds LOT 1: Cypher Stamps / CypherPostage Set #5STARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 2: Cypher Stamps / CypherPostage Set #9STARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 3: Cipher Bonds 100,000 Satoshi Time-Lock Bond Certificate + Cipher Bills 100,000 Satoshi Certificate*Notes do have water-damage, but have been assured by the creator they are still functional and the hologram/keys are unaffectedSTARTING BID: 0.0020BTC*All Stamps, Bills and Bonds are loaded with their face value!! *Certificates are printed on special water-marked paper as seen below*Winners will have to supply a separate Polygon address for their NFT*There will be a separate pamphlet included to instruct how to use the notes/postage*Link to the Cypher Hodl Timeline to help with any questions: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412935STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JANUARY 30rd, 2023, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
